类 Path

java.lang.Object
Path
public class Path extends Object
This class holds a found path from the start to the end node. The actual path is constructed by calling the reconstructPath(Node end) method in the SearchMethod base class.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型

    path
    The list of nodes in the path

    • Path

      public Path()
      Constructor.

  • 方法详细资料

    • add

      public void add​(Node n)
      Adds a new node to the path. Called when reconstructing a path after a pathfinding search.
      参数:
      n - The end node

    • addLast

      public void addLast​(Node n)
      Adds a new node last in the path. Called when reconstructing a path after a pathfinding search.
      参数:
      n - The end node

    • recalculateLength

      public void recalculateLength()
      Resets and recalculates the path length.

    • getLength

      public double getLength()
      Returns the total length of the path.
      返回:
      Total path length

    • getPieces

      public int getPieces()
      Returns the number of segments (links) in the path.
      返回:
      Number of segments (links)

    • showPathLinks

      public void showPathLinks()
      Show the links in the path. This method is used by the GUI to visualize the found path.
